narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This 1st pre-license inspection is for a Class “B” license.  Applicant shall submit the license fee to the Region office
located in Ft. Collins, CO.  
Conducting regulated activities without a valid USDA license is a violation of the Animal Welfare Act.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the CEO.  The inspection report is being delivered via email.
